amendment.description: Amendment makes it a crime to knowingly misappropriate the personal identification information of a minor in interstate or foreign commerce.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 17 printed in the Congressional Record to make it a crime to knowingly misappropriate the personal identification information of a minor in interstate or foreign commerce. The offense will be punishable by fines or imprisonment for not more than 10 years, or both.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A024) Agreed to by voice vote.
